Description.Text: Ideally located in the prime touristic area of Newington, Kildonan Lodge Hotel promises a relaxing and wonderful visit. The hotel has everything you need for a comfortable stay. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at the Kildonan Lodge Hotel. All rooms are designed and decorated to make guests feel right at home, and some rooms come with internet access – wireless, internet access – wireless (complimentary), whirlpool bathtub, non smoking rooms, heating. The hotel offers various recreational opportunities. Kildonan Lodge Hotel combines warm hospitality with a lovely ambiance to make your stay in Edinburgh unforgettable.
